name: Elementares Divinos
startIntroPart1: Hello, we are the divine beings sent by Felizmir
startIntroPart2: Our mission in the world is to protect humanity, and for that we want to be the main power as well!
declaringWar: you tested the goodness of the divine, you will regret it
attacked: Do you want to play? Very funny!
defeated: you have no right to beat us, Felizmir won't like that at all..
introduction: the people chosen by Felizmir wish to keep the land in peace until the end of time.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
